rules_text:
[i]Augmented[/i] – When Behavioral Specialist enters, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, create a 1/1 blue Elemental creature token with flying.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: [i]“I'm searching for something that I can't reach.”[/i]
